title: Indian WWI Troops Praying Image MCQ 3

content.question: The situation shown in the image is best understood in the context of which of the following aspects of twentieth-century warfare?

choices.label: States used propaganda to intensify patriotism in times of war.
States used new industrial technologies to fight wars that were deadlier and more expensive.
States made full use of their populations and material resources to fight total wars.
States increasingly mobilized their citizens for warfare regardless of gender or class.

content.answer: States made full use of their populations and material resources to fight total wars.
